sentence: Perhaps even more significantly, leaders of the Wyoming Republican Party signed a letter calling Cheney's primary challenger, Harriet Hageman, the presumptive nominee for the seat Cheney is running to retain.
author: Laura Clawson
title: Plan to censure Cheney and Kinzinger suggests Republicans are nervous about the Jan. 6 committee
